p: Eimeria tenella sporozoites (0.5 × 10 6/well) were pre-treated for 1 h at 41°C−5% CO 2 with essential oils of garlic or oregano at different concentrations (100, 50, 20, 5 μg/ml from the stocks) in Advanced DMEM, as described in Pastor-Fernandez et al. ( 29). DMSO (10 μl/ml) and robenidine (anticoccidial; 5 μg/ml) were used as controls for E. tenella infection.
